definition: echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly
sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
to start shooting or firing/to win an initial success/to succeed (of a plan)
to sound a bell/to raise the alarm

sentences.english: What time shall I set the alarm (clock) for?
sentences.chinese: 我该把闹钟拨到几点钟响？

sentences.english: In the middle of the bridge,his old car spluttered out.
sentences.chinese: 在过桥走到桥中间时，他的那辆破车劈啪响着熄了火。

sentences.english: Sometimes M. Mabeuf started at the sound of the bell.
sentences.chinese: 有时马白夫先生听到门铃响而惊动起来。

sentences.english: The carrying pole creaked under the load.
But to bats, it's as loud as a jet airplane.
sentences.chinese: 但是对于蝙蝠来说，它们响的就像喷气式飞机。

sentences.english: The telephone had been ringing for three minutes before it was answered.
sentences.chinese: 电话铃响了三分钟才有人接。

sentences.english: No one’s half as nerdy as I am. The bell rang in thirty seconds, precisely what her watch said.
sentences.chinese: 三十秒后下课铃响了，跟她的表分秒不差。

sentences.english: The pot should only smile with heat.
Then I heard a faint beeping noise that didn't sound like a bird.
sentences.chinese: 这时，我听见一阵微弱的响闹声，听起来不像是鸟叫。

sentences.english: The military band played the national anthems of China and Spain with 21 salutes lingering in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 在雄壮的21响礼炮声中，军乐队演奏中西两国国歌。

sentences.english: For most newer vehicles, turn the cap until you hear it click three times.
sentences.chinese: 对于新汽车来说，拧紧盖子，直至听到响三下。

sentences.english: The leaves are rustling in the wind.
Then the fire alarm went off. I just grabbed my clothes and ran out.
sentences.chinese: 当时火险警报器响了，我一把抓起衣服就往外跑。

sentences.english: This time ear side apparently return at ring lightly that voice.
sentences.chinese: 此时的耳畔似乎还在轻轻的响着那声音。

sentences.english: She never got caught but, once, the alarm went off.
sentences.chinese: 她从来没被抓住过，不过有一次，警报响了。

definition: sharp and clear/crisp/melodious/ringing/tinkling/silvery (of sound)/fragile/frail/also written 輕脆|轻脆
Dongdong, cheerleading mascot of 2008 Beijing Olympics
(onom.) scraping sound/ripping of fabric/screeching of tires
sharp and clear/crisp/melodious/ringing/tinkling/silvery (of sound)/fragile/frail/also written 清脆
(onom.) for crack, slap, clap, clatter etc
